alert.note: Alert for Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 10 at 6:53AM MST until March 11 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 8 to 11 inches. * WHERE...Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains below 11000 feet. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Banded snow is expected, therefore locally heavy snow is possible causing hazardous travel conditions, including snow covered roads and low visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft
